ygData.subject: Re: Duel Weild & Sta.
ygData.msgSnippet: Could you also fill me in on how weilding works?  How it s used, also as shown below, I;ve noticed that you said something thats it better to have a faster
ygData.messageBody:
Could you also fill me in on how weilding works? How it's used, also as
shown below, I;ve noticed that you said something thats it better to have a
faster weapon in primary and also how come when i see people with duel
weilding I only seem em' using there primary wepon, does it not show you use
both or is there something i have to do? I should be expecting lvl 15 around
this sun. so PELASE tell me everything I need to know and what wepon you
recommend.

----Original Message Follows----
From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Duel Weild & Sta.
Date: Tue, 25 May 1999 09:51:37 -0500

From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>

(I'm going by memory here so these stats may be a little off)

FS long sword 5 28
Combine long sword same as FS
Barbed Whip 7 28

There is no sta skill, this is one of your character stats.

If you think kicking is tough on your stamina, try it with 2 minos :)

Parry will go up, if you only put 3 points into it, it will take it a little
while before it starts to go up.

Banded is far better than blackend or ring. Blackend is lower AC and much
heavier than ringmail.....but it does look cool :) which is why I've a got
a full set myself :)

ps. to me, the point of dual wielding it to get a large number of attacks.
Wielding a weapon with the delay of a good 2h sword kinda defeats the
purpose. Not to mention that your dual attack is based in part on the speed
of your primary weapon. Don't get me wrong, the mino is a GREAT weapon for
1h slash, but when you hit 15th and get double attack and dual wield there
are much better weapons to be used, IMO

>>> "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...> 5.24.99 9:35:39 PM >>>
From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>

When I get Duel Weild I'm prob. going to go with the best Mino. Batlle
Axe
couse it does a wooping 8dmg/35delay and with my secondary wepon I'll prob.
use a Fine Steel Long Sword OR a barbed whip OR a combine long sword.

P.S Could someone please tellme the specs. on the Fine Stell Long Sword,
Combine Long Sword and Barbed Whip?


How do you cheack my skill in sta. and how do I get that skill up.

P.S I also found that using kick often in a row draws your sta. down, but if
you use bash is dosn't seem to bring sta. down as much as kick.

I've just got Perry skill and put 3 skill points into it. Is this
automatic and I've never seen it been used. Is this skill even working and
is the skill going up?

I've just gotten Blacken Armor and replaced it with my banded and
ringmail
armor! Man, the weight is so much lighter and the AC is much more better!
I suggest any lvl 12+ people go to the RiverVale area hunt though goblines
and get that armor! + is looks so cool!
